item.title: That time I found a typo in Portable Stimulus Standard
item.description: For few weeks, I was obsessed(for the lack of better word) with PSS and naturally I decided to write the BNF in LARK and I even stared on AST transformations. Anyway, while I am copying parts of BNF I noticed an error with type_identifier. When i looked at the rule, I noticed it is saying type_identifer_elem. See the issue there? type_identifier: [ "::" ] type_identifer_elem ( "::" type_identifer_elem )* Now, i saw the glitch in the matrix, I have no idea how to report it.
